original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1336)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(1341)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵方全體造成物理傷害。並且再以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(391)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對範圍內敵方造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1336)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(1341)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> inflicts physical damage on all enemies.
